code: import React,{useContext,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import axios from'axios';import Loading from'./Loading';import Error from'./Error';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserProfile(){const{user}=useContext(AuthContext);const[reviews,setReviews]=useState([]);const[watchlist,setWatchlist]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{if(!user){setLoading(false);return;}const fetchUserData=async()=>{try{const reviewsRes=await axios.get("/api/reviews/user/".concat(user._id));const watchlistRes=await axios.get("/api/users/".concat(user._id,"/watchlist"));setReviews(reviewsRes.data);setWatchlist(watchlistRes.data);}catch(err){setError('Failed to load user data');}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchUserData();},[user]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Error,{message:error});if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Please login to view your profile."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[user.name,"'s Profile"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"review-history",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Review History"}),reviews.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No reviews yet."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:reviews.map(review=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:review.movie.title}),": ",review.comment," (",review.rating," stars)"]},review._id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"watchlist",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Watchlist"}),watchlist.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your watchlist is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:watchlist.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:movie.title},movie._id))})]})]});}export default UserProfile;
